Address complement must be within 30 characters
Address complement will not accept characters with diacritics or accent marks. Please verify and try again.
Address number must be within 5 characters

If you haven’t finished your account registration, you will be redirected to where you stopped.
Sorry something went wrong. Please try again later.
Type or paste the boleto number you want to pay, located next to the barcode:
Download completed.Please check your Downloads folder
Your password must contain 8 to 16 characters, with at least one lowercase, uppercase letters and one number.
Read below the general terms and conditions for opening digital multi-accounts.
Read below the terms and conditions for declaring residence details for opening digital multi-accounts.
The first digital account built in your smartphone
For use on non-Motorola devices of customers already with a Dimo
To continue Dimo onboarding, please use a Motorola device. If you don't have access to one, please contact support for assistance.
Hello, we are glad you want to evolve with us!
The Dimo account is exclusive to Motorola customers. If you already have yours, look for the icon in the application menu or inside Hello You and open yours.
Don`t have a Motorola Smartphone yet? Check our unmissabel offers.
Make sure to read and accept our
Dimo is a digital platform that acts as a correspondent in the country of Banco Arbi S/A (CNPJ/ME 54.403.563/0001-50) pursuant to CMN Resolution no. 4.935/21. SAC and Ombudsman.
Use the contacts below to talk to us. We will be ready to help you!
For any problem related to our service:
We’re going to start off with simple information about you.
We'll need some basic information to set up your account. Tip: Enter your nickname or your first name
An e-mail will be sent in order to verify your phone.
Do you accept to receive news, promotions,offers and tips about Motorola benefits via email?
You’ll receive an email to verify your account
Your CPF will be the main identification source for this account.
You can use letters, numbers and special characters. Don’t use sequenced numbers of your birthday or documents.
At least one special character like @#$
I confirm that this is my address.
Is there a complement for you address?
If you don’t have a salary you can consider rents, allowance and etc.
To make this step quicker, grab your documents and be prepared for some selfies!
Please allow storage permission to access photos and media on your phone
Please allow camera permission to capture selfie and the photos of the document
What document do you prefer to use?
Please choose how you would like to provide your document:
Use only official Digital Documents exported from
Here are some tips to take the best ID photo:
• Remove the plastic from your document to make the photo clearer
• Hold your phone steady while taking the photo
• Look for a place with good lighting
First, take a picture of the front side of ID
First, take a picture of the front side of your CNH
First, take a picture of the front side of your RNE
Take a nice and sharp photo of the front of your ID, just like the illustration above. Make sure all data is clear.
Take a nice and sharp photo of the front of your CNH, just like the illustration above. Make sure all data is clear.
Tip: you dont have to unfold your document!
Now, take a picture of the back side of your ID
Now, take a picture of the back side of your CNH
Take a nice and sharp photo of the back of your ID, just like the illustration above. Make sure all data is clear.
Take a nice and sharp photo of the back of your CNH, just like the illustration above. Make sure all data is clear.
Is your photo clear and sharp? If it’s not, you can retake the photo.
Is all the data visible? If it’s not, you can retake the photo.
Is your face in good visibility? If it’s not, you can retake your selfie.
It’s time to take a selfie!
Here are some tips to get a good photo:
Do not wear glasses or hats.
Hold your Motorola firmly so that the photo is clear.
Tip: Make sure your camera is in vertical position.
And you get 1% cashback on all purchases.*
Open your free account and invest in CDB that yields 106% CDI.
Up to 20% OFF on Motorola smartphones and the chance to earn a new one every week.
*Limited time offer! Check conditions in the app.
It's debit! Buy in physical stores or online.
And with the Vai de Visa benefits program, you enjoy exclusive discounts at stores, restaurants and more!
You need to be in a well-lit place so your document photo come out is as clear as possible
Take the plastic off the document
This is important in order to avoid reflections and ensure data readability
To avoid blurry photos, hold your phone steady while taking the photo
First, take a picture of the front side of your ID
Take a nice and sharp photo of the front of your ID, just like illustration below. Make sure all data is clear.
Position your face in the center of the camera.
Is your photo clear and sharp? If it's not, you can retake your photo.
Now, take a picture of the back side of your ID
Is all the data visible? If it's not, you can retake the photo.
It's time to take a selfie!
Please take off any accessories such as glasses, caps or anything that might make it difficult to recognize your face.
Tip: Make sure your camera is in vertical position.
Is your face in good visibility? If it's not, you can retake your Selfie
First, take a picture of the front side of your CNH
Take a nice and sharp photo of the front of your CNH, just like the illustration below. Make sure all data is clear.
You dont have to unfold your document!
Now, take a picture of the back side of your CNH
Take a nice and sharp photo of the back of your CNH, just like the illustration below. Make sure all data is clear.
Some information from your documents couldn't be automatically identified. Please fill in the missing details below to continue with your onboarding process.
The date of birth value entered is invalid
Make sure all information shared is correct, as you won’t be able to change it afterwards.
Please enter valid Date of Birth
Users under the age 18 are not allowed to create an account
Your answer must be aligned with the info in your ID. This question is asked in order to follow the Central Bank instructions.
Are you a politically exposed person?
This information is requested by the Central Bank, in order to track any unusual transactions.

Politically Exposed Persons (PEPs) are individuals who currently hold or have held relevant public positions or functions in the last five years, both in Brazil and abroad. These promotions also extend to family members up to second degree, such as partners, companions and stepchildren.
The start date value entered is invalid
The end date value entered is invalid
End date must be greater than start date
Start date must be greater than date of birth
Monthly income must be within R$ 99.99 million
Monthly income must be euqal to or greater than R$ 1
Name length must be within 2-20 characters
Company name length must be within 2-100 characters
Issue date must be greater than date of birth
The document cannot be more than 10 years old from its date of issue. You may try again with another, newer document.
Please select an option from the list
Please fill all details to proceed
Enter below the code we just sent to phone number:
You can resend the code again in {0}:{1}
To finish your registration, verify your email.
In order to proceed with your registration, click on the verification link sent to: {0}
In up to 3 days you will receive a confirmation.
Account does not exist for this CPF
In order to reset your password, a verification code will be sent to your phone number.
Looks like you typed the wrong password. For security reasons, your access will be blocked after 5 unsuccessful attempts.
Sorry we were not able to authenticate you, please login with cpf and password
Follow the steps sent to the registered email address.
We are almost there! Please follow the steps to keep your account safe and ready to use all the features.
To start using your account, you need to create a password to make transactions in app and purchases with your account card.
Your card is on its way!
No maintanance taxes or annuity fee, in addition to several benefits to make your day-to-day finances easier.
Until it arrives, you can already use all the features of your account
You will use this pin for in app transactions and purchases with your physical card.
With Pix you can pay and receive only using your email, CPF or phone number.
Your salary can be received in this account automatically every month.
Pay easily and securely with your card using Google Pay.
A tax free international card with the best benefits for you!
Are you sure you want to stop the registration now?
Your login is already created. If you pause, you can login and continue without losing your information in the next 48 hours
Sorry, it seems you've already registered this email address before. Please enter a different email address.
Sorry, it seems you've already registered this phone number before. Please enter a different phone number.
Available at any time, by registering a Pix key, using a phone number, CPF, email or a random key, you are able to send and receive money with Pix.
Choose which key type you want to use
You don't have any registered Pix key, would you like to register now?
Pix is fast to register and use, you can send or receive money in a few seconds.
It works everyday so you can send or receive anytime.
Pix is fast to register and use, you can send or receive money in a few seconds.
You can set up to 5 Pix keys. To start using register atleast one using CPF, email, phone number or Random key.
Receive and send money in seconds!
View and edit your PIX keys
Select which key type you want to register
Ready! Now you can share your key to receive money in seconds.
This information will be visible when scanned :
Hi! use this Pix key to transfer money from any bank
Do you really want to delete this key?
To receive amount using Pix, you must register atleast 1 key
The Pix key entered is invalid.
You will be redirected back to Hello You.
How to register your Pix keys
How to deposit money in your account
To enable login with device security, you need to confirm your device password/biometric
Make your future access to Dimo easier using the same device security you use to unlock your phone
Who would you like to transfer to?
You can enter a CPF/CNPJ, email, phone number or a random key
How much do you want to send to
Invalid pix key, check if the information is correct or use another key to make the transfer
We couldn't identify your key, which key are you trying to transfer?
Add money to your account and enjoy Dimo’s benefits
How much do you want to send?
Oops! This amount is higher than your balance.
CPF/CNPJ, email, phone or Random key
Enter the copy and paste link
Find a contact or create a new one
Pix description must be within 140 characters
Sorry! we had a technical issue, please try again.
Sorry! we had a communication problem, please try again.
The account you're trying to send is not available.
Transaction time limit exceeded. please try again.
The account you are trying to send does not exists
The receiving keys/account should not belong/be sending account.
Key not found. Check the code and try again. If it is a pix key, you must paste it in send area.
This is taking more time than expected…
Your Pix is still being processed and we will notify you as soon as it is done.
You can also check the status in Transactions Page.
If you do not have enough balance on the scheduled day, the payment will not be placed.
Enter a value or select Don't disclose value
You can show it to the payer or share link
Your QR code is at hand!
Share your code to receive a payment
Your information appears like this to anyone who reads the code
Select the key to which you want send via Pix:
This information will be visible when scanned:
Your 4 digit numeric password is blocked for safety reasons. Please reset your password from profile.
Sorry, we could not log you in, please login by providing username and password
Expiration date must be within 15 calendar days of the current date
We weren’t able to proceed with your registration
Contact out Customer Care to learn more about what went wrong.
The money will be available in up to 3 days after payment
This key is being used in other institution. Would you like to start portability?
This key is being used by other person. Would you like to start ownership portability?
This key is being already being used by you. Please choose a different key
After start portability, you will have 7 days to confirm in the other institution, otherwise, the process will be cancelled.
After you confirm portability in the other institution, you will receive a notification about the key activation.
You will be able to send and receive money on Dimo using the same PIX key.
Your portability request has been requested. Go to your other institution to conclude the portability.
Another institution requested the portability of this key. If you wish to transfer this key to this new institution, review the data, and then tap on "Confirm portability"
The portability request has been accepted. This key will soon be available on your new institution.
Another person requested the portabiliy of this key. Review the information and if everything looks right, click on "Confirm portability"
The portability request has been accepted. This key will soon will be transfered to the new owner.
Your portability request has been canceled
Withdraw your money without a card
Withdraw at merchants without having to make purchases or at 24-hour ATMs
Simply ask the attendant to generate a Pix Withdrawal QR Code and enter the amount. At the 24-hour ATM, look for the "Digital withdrawal" option and access the QR Code
To make the Pix Saque you have to do it the same way as you pay with Pix, just scan the QR Code and follow the steps
With dimo, you can withdraw up to 8 times for free and merchants cannot charge additional fees
When do you want to send?
For which day do you want to schedule the Pix?
For which day do you want to schedule the TED?
Para qual dia você gostaria de agendar esse boleto?
Cannot schedule for dates beyond 12 months from today
TED is unavailable for today, but if you want, you can still schedule a transaction
TED is available after 8AM, but if you want, you can still schedule a transaction
Oops! This amount is higher than your balance and may not execute successfully.
How do you want to bring money to your account?
How much money do you want to receive?
Input value from R$ 25,00 to R$ {0}.
Input value from R$ 20,00 to R$ 1.000,00
Ask for payment and receive in your account in three days
Transfer from other banks to your account
Ask for payments with QR code or key
If you do not define due date, boleto will expire in 3 days
After the payment, your money will be in your account in 3 business days
You can pay this Boleto anytime after 15 minutes
Remember: It can take up to 15 minutes before you be able to pay it.
Where can I find my boletos?
You can find the all boletos you created in your balance, under the “Boleto generated” filter tab
Are you sure you want to cancel this boleto?
This action can not be undone
This boleto is no longer valid for payment
To copy the information, click on the copy button. You can also share all information at once.
Hi! use this information to transfer money from any bank

Dimo é uma plataforma digital pertencente a Motorola Mobility Serviços de Tecnologia Eireli (CNPJ/ME 42.805.026/0001-57) que atua como correspondente no país do Banco Arbi S/A (CNPJ/ME 54.403.563/0001-50) na solução tecnológica de produtos e serviços financeiros, seguindo as diretrizes do Banco Central do Brasil, nos termos da Resolução CMN nº. 4.935/21. Serviço de Atendimento ao Cliente – SAC Banco Arbi S/A: 08007220708 – Ouvidoria: 0800285233 ouvidoria@bancoarbi.com.br
Don't use sequenced numbers of your birthday or documents.

Google Pay must be installed on the phone for adding this card to Google Pay from Dimo app.
Google Pay must be set as default Tap & Pay app on the phone for adding this card to Google Pay from Motorola Digital Account app.
Pay with more commodity and security using Google Pay.
Google Pay is Google's virtual wallet that keeps your Dimo with you at all time!
Register the card in the application to make purchases online or by tapping your smartphone¹ on the machine.
Add your Dimo Visa to Google Wallet!
Simplify your payments quickly and securely.
Pay by contactless* at various establishments using just your Motorola smartphone.
¹Check if your smartphone has an NFC sensor to enable the function
Everything ready to make your daily life even more practical. Shall we go?

From Monday to Friday, from 9 am to 8 pm. On Saturdays, from 9am to 3pm. Except Sundays and holidays.

How to bring money to your account
There are a few ways to bring money into your account. You can choose the one better fits you.
Boleto is a document you can send to the payer and you will receive the money in up to 3 days after the payment.
You can simply copy and paste your account information for someone to send you money transers.
Using Pix you can instantly receive money at any time by sharing your Pix key or a QR Code for payment.
You can configure your account to automatically receive your salary. It's safe and costless.
How do you want to bring money to your account?
Ask for payment and receive in your account in two days
Transfer from other banks to your account
Ask for payments with QR code or key

The migration will take place under Motorola's initiative, responsibility and expense.

Dimo Voz reads out aloud your transaction notifications, providing you with a convenient way to stay informed, even when you're busy or overwhelmed with notifications on your device.
Dimo Voz also allows you to customize your alerts according to your preferences.
This will enable Dino Voz audio notifications when you receive money through the chosen methods below:

Sorry! We could not fecth your keys right now! Please try later
Pix is eletronic and costless payment method that allows you to send or receive money anytime! We made this tutorial to help you start using it.
Pix use keys to make easier to share with someone. Using a key, you wont need to inform all your account details to receive a transfer, that’s why we recommend you to have at least 1 key registered.
There are 4 different types of keys: CPF, E-mail, Phone number and Random key

You can always send Pix, even if you has no registered keys. To start sending, just click Send in the Main screen or inside Pix area. You will be able to choose how to send, using a Pix key or informing full account details.
If you want to receive from someone using Pix, you can just share the key you want to use, go to the My Keys screen inside Pix area and select a key to share.
the selfie you sent was not approved!
We need you to retake the selfie. Make sure you’re in good light conditions and your face is visible.

Motorola is here to help you
This app allows Motorola to send you communications about services and benefits, such as:
Get information about software updates and new products.
Receive invitations to participate in studies and surveys.
Get the best deals in our motostores and e-commerce.
Learn about features that are important to you.
If you disable location we will no longer send you customized news and promotions.
If you disable whatsapp we will no longer send you customized news and promotions.
If you disable push notification we will no longer send you customized news and promotions.
The unsubscribe process can take up to 24 hours to be completed
Do you accept to receive news, promotions, offers and tips about Motorola benefits via push notifications?
Don’t let your money sit idle!
Anticipate your Saque-aniversário FGTS right now
Quick money direct in your account
Out of money? take a relief for your bills
This allow you to instantly receive your FGTS idle money, by anticipating the Saque-aniversário installments.
What do i need to do?
Authorize Banco Arbi S.A. (Dimo’s bank partner)
Come back and anticipate your FGTS
We are in contact with Caixa
You will receive the money directly in your account in a instant.
And don’t forget, you can come back here in 3 months to get a new anticipation!
Scroll to see step by step below
On the app: Read and accept the terms of conditions and sign in for Saque-aniversário
Go to “Authorize banks to consult your FGTS”
Authorize Arbi, the Bank partner of Dimo to consult your FGTS balance.
Are you sure you want to leave a part of your FGTS amount standing still?
You cannot anticipate your FGTS at the moment because your anniversary date is too close. Please try again in one month.
Something went wrong with your FGTS withdraw request, please try again later.
Unfortunately, we were unable to contact Caixa at this time, please try again later.
Your FGTS balance is below the minimum to be anticipated. Please try again next month!
What do you want to do?
see how much you can have available in your account
Check everything you need to contract the service
How much would you like to anticipate?
Insert the approximated amount available in your FGTS balance and we will inform how much can be anticipated for you

Get a credit limit based on your investment
Build your credit while you invest
A credit investment card is a unique type of credit card that requires users to invest a certain amount of money to access their credit limit:
With Credit-Investment, you can build your credit score and invest your money at the same time.
When you use your credit investment card responsibly, you'll see your credit score go up and your investments grow.
Your credit limit is tied to the amount of money you've invested, and this can help you avoid overspending and getting into debt.
In addition to guaranteeing you more credit, your investment credit yields {0}% of the {1}. Rest assured, your money will be safe with us.

The available amount value of R$ {0} already includes taxes, fees and IOF. This is the total amount you can withdraw, taking into account all applicable charges. For more details on the specific components, see the details below:
With a guaranteed limit, the amount you deposit becomes your credit card limit.
Make a deposit that becomes your credit limit, yielding 106% of the CDI.
Buy in physical and online stores, pay in installments and earn cash back.
Access the app and pay the invoice with your account balance.
It is important to maintain your reserve to continue using it as a credit limit.
Deposit from R$50 and the amount becomes your credit limit available for use. For example: if you deposit R$500, your credit limit will be R$500.
Dimo Limite Garantido does not require credit analysis, which means it is available to everyone, including those who are negative.
How can I increase my limit?
You can make a new deposit at any time.
Where does the deposited money go?
It is safe in a CDB reserve, which works like a piggy bank and yields more than savings, at 106% of the CDI!
For more details on how your money is saved,

Dimo Guaranteed Limit Credit Card will be ready to be used in various establishments, physical and online. You can also register it for streaming, delivery or private transport apps, pay for your purchases in installments and even earn cashback.
How much cashback will I receive?
You earn 1% back of the value of each purchase made on credit to your Dimo balance. Accumulate up to R$25 in cashback every month!

Your account balance is different from the amount you set aside to have a limit. Therefore, on your card's expiration date, you must pay your bill using the balance in your account. If payment does not occur 5 days after the due date, the amount reserved as a limit on the card will be used in part or in full to make this payment.

For your credit card to remain active, it is important that you maintain the reserved deposit amount. If you redeem this application, the limit is automatically adjusted according to the amount withdrawn.
But can I redeem my deposit at any time?
You can redeem the deposited amount whenever you want, as long as it is not being consumed on the invoice. But remember that when you withdraw an amount, your credit limit will change.
How does the yield work on the Dimo Credit Card Guaranteed Limit?
Deposited, became limit! And the money keeps working for you. Check out the details:
The deposit amount is applied to a safe CDB reserve protected by the Credit Guarantee Fund (FGC).
One of the best yields on the market:
Your money yields more than savings, at 106% of the CDI.

The minimum deposit to release the limit is R$50.00, with a maximum limit of R$20,000.00. The money deposited has daily liquidity with maturity in May 2025. This means that you can redeem the amount whenever you want, as long as it is not being consumed in the invoice, and the redemption deadline is 05/25. Don't worry, we'll let you know when it's close to that date.
Do you want to deactivate automatic debit?
When deactivating automatic debit, you will need to make the payment manually, using the balance in your Dimo account, by the due date.

Remember that the value of your account is different from the amount reserved as the card limit. The balance reserved as the card limit will only be used partially or completely to pay your invoice, if 5 days after the due date, it continues without an identified payment.
Access the card settings to change this option whenever necessary.
Do you want to activate automatic debit?
Activate so that your invoices are paid automatically with the money available in your Dimo account, on the due date.

Remember that the value of your account is different from the amount reserved as the card limit. The balance reserved as the card limit will only be used partially or completely to pay your invoice, if 5 days after the due date, it continues without an identified payment.
Access the card settings to change this option whenever necessary.
